1.text: Cut an 8.5 in (22 cm) wide and 17 in (43 cm) long piece of cardboard.

2.text: Cut out 2 more identical pieces of cardboard.

3.text: Lay all 3 panels side by side lengthwise.
3.vid: /6/61/Make a T Shirt Folder Step 3 Version 3.360p.mp4

4.text: Tape the top half of the panels together.
4.vid: /a/ac/Make a T Shirt Folder Step 4 Version 3.360p.mp4

5.text: Measure halfway up the middle panel and draw a line across it.
5.vid: /9/90/Make a T Shirt Folder Step 5 Version 3.360p.mp4

6.text: Score a line across the center of the middle panel.
6.vid: /a/ae/Make a T Shirt Folder Step 6 Version 3.360p.mp4

7.text: Place the T-shirt face-down on the center panel.
7.vid: /a/a3/Make a T Shirt Folder Step 7 Version 3.360p.mp4

8.text: Flip the left flap over to fold the left arm.

9.text: Flip the right flap over to fold the right arm.

11.text: Store your T-shirt with the design facing outwards.
